channel.title: I came across a nasty problem
channel.description: i cant add my server to the moparscape server status page, although my no-ip ip s checked in my DUC and my runserver.bat is running .... When i add it to the moparscapae server status page it says its offline, how is that possible if its online ? WTF

item.title: I came across a nasty problem
item.dc:creator: @mackel mackel
item.description:
@mackel wrote:

yea well, i already did the firewall thing and i did the router 198.162.1.2 thing

Read full topic
item.source: I came across a nasty problem

item.title: I came across a nasty problem
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

yeah, firewalls is opening ports, with a linksys router, enter “192.168.1.1” in the address bar, a box will pop up. username and pass should be “admin” and “admin”. Then u r logged onto ur router

Read full topic
item.source: I came across a nasty problem

item.title: I came across a nasty problem
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

that’s not port forwarding…

port forwarding is through your router… not through firewalls

Read full topic

item.title: I came across a nasty problem
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

[quote=“mackel, post:8, topic:171884”][quote author=~8ballcrazy~ link=topic=231970.msg1985194#msg1985194 date=1199781140]
WOOF THEN THAT MEANS U AINT GOTTA ROUTER
[/quote][quote author=woofdawg23 link=topic=231970.msg1985189#msg1985189 date=1199781005]

[quote author=mackel link=topic=231970.msg1985180#msg1985180 date=1199780910]
i port forwarded already …
[/quote]u turn ur firewalls off or adleast allowed expectations? then ppl wil lbe able 2 connect.
[/quote]I have a presario v6000 laptop , im connected to a router that is a modem at the same time, my firewall is unblocked and i already edited my enviromental variables with CLASSPATH and PATH , and i port forwarded , as i said before… I have vista[/quote]
Ok, go to the start menu. In the search spot,type “firewall”, you should see “Windows Firewall” or “Windows Firewall with Advanced Security” Which is what I have. Tell me which you got then we can move on to the next step…

Read full topic

grow a brain? well i didn’t know server status wasn’t working, whats your deal buddy ? if your gonna be rude about it how about following these 3 easy steps that any retard can succeed in:

1# ask your mom to drive you to a bridge
2# jump off the bridge
3# <— i dont think YOUR brain can handle this step, it takes a higher iq than 1 to be able to comprehend this.

and thank you kiwon about that nice post, ill check rune-server, thanks again
